Content: [ Carmen is angry that Donald Trump confirms every negativestereotype out there about Republicans, and she is going to do something about it. Trump may be ahead in the polls right now for the Republican nominee in the 2016 presidential election, but in previous elections, there were others just like him who started out strong and petered out. Anyone remember Michele Bachmann or Ross Perot? Carmen plans on sending him to the same place they are. Where? Read on and find out. ]
Author: [ Scott Stantis]
Title: [ Prickly City: Did she trump Trump?!]
